Cute top! Just very tight around the chest area and not as loose around the hips as pictured. Had I gotten a size up I think it would look more like the picture.

I am top heavy and I ordered a large (I am between a medium and large) and it fit very awkwardly. I really loved this shirt and how it looked. Unfortunately it was cheaply made. It reminded me of the nice Shein shirts. So I returned it. It did look nice on.
This blouse has semi sheer lantern sleeves and the bodice is fully lined.  Such a great floral feminine blouse.  Wearing a size small.
A very feminine blouse.  The sleeves are sheer, but there's a lining to the rest of the blouse for modesty.

I loved this top! I ordered another one just like it, but different color! I also ordered the short sleeved tops as well, great for work, going out for nice dinner or dress it down with a cute pair of jeans.
The fabric and style of this top is adorable. I am a little busty and am happy to say this accommodates the girls!
This is ok. It is constructed well and is true to color. However, it is much better looking on this listing than it is in person.  Very casual looking compared to the listing, imho.
This didn’t look or fit anywhere near what you see in the picture. The material and craftsmanship was very cheap
Lve the colors and print, the sheerness was giving slightly sexy, and comfortable cute. It was very light weight which is perfect for fall in Vegas.

I'm a bigger girl so I went up on the size.  deffinatly not made for biggter girls.  Don't let the big sizes fool you.  Because of the material and design there is NO give on this shirt at all. Lightweight yet still provides a littler warmth.  The sleeves are sheer and the body portion of the shirt is lined so it is not see thru. The sleeve length is great and I love that the shirt has a little bit of a flow to it.

评论详情: Ugly is all I have to say
Very pretty blouse, but runs two sizes too small.
If you are looking for something light and easy to step-up your outfit, slip this on. It is cute, comfortable, and fits right in at work. It fit as expected. I highly recommend this top!

This is a beautiful flowy lightweight shirt that has a sort of retro look to it. It fits really nicely and is very breathable and cooling. I love the sleeves they have a sort of flowy feel to them too.

This is a pretty shirt…I ordered the red one and the color is really lovely. The fabric is sheer, but the blouse has a sewn-in lining so it isn’t see-through (except for the sleeves, which aren’t lined). It isn’t as blousy as it looks in the product photos which appear to have a rounded hemline…the blouse I received has a straight hemline and a slightly narrower fit. I’m 5’9”, 126 lbs (35” bust, 27” waist) and based on the size chart, I ordered a small. It fits well, although it’s just a tad narrower than I was expecting, so if you want a blousier look for tucking (like the model in the product photos), then I might suggest sizing up.
True to size and a great color match to the pictures. Very well made.
I loved how this fit and how it made me feel feminine.

I am 1.67 meters tall, 5.6 feet tall, weigh approximately 78 kg and wear a size 36 D in a bra.  I ordered size M and it still fits me ok, at the moment I have a few extra pounds, but I refuse to buy size L, which might fit me better.  I like the print of the blouse, I like that it is long enough to wear inside or out, it also has a lining so that the bra is not visible.

评论概述: Not particularly my style but I'm loving it!!
评论详情: This cute blouse totally surprised me! It seems a bit shapeless when untucked but when tucked in it completely transforms. It is perfect for the changing weather. I ordered a small, which felt slightly big for me but I'm still loving all the flow. The inner layer however, felt just right, not loose at all, which might make sizing a bit tricky for some.

评论概述: Great colors, lightweight and airy shirt
评论详情: Absolutely love this blouse!  Nice material and well made.  The color is perfect for fall and can be worn with jeans to dress them up or with dress pants or skirt.  The sleeves are sheer,  flow and look great. The body of the shirt is fully lined so it is not see through.  Shirt is well made and feels good on.  I ordered a medium and it fits perfect

This is a very cute top! Has great fabric, great fit, and great feel. As you can see from the photos it may be a tiny bit large - but it’s also very comfortable has elastic at the bottom of the sleeves so you can push it up to whatever height on your arms you want it. The color is bright and vivid and I expect to wear this year-round even under a jacket here in the south.

I feel like anything pink is great! This blouse certainly matches my color preferences and I like it's casual style. It is easy to wear and match with a white trouser, short or skirt. It has very large sleeves, which is nice but important to know. is has an inner layer (white lining) so it is not see through. It sizes a bit too large though, so I took one star away.

I got the Gray Floral in my typical size small. I feel it is a bit too big for my liking, especially untucked and in the sleeve region. The sleeves are quite large and ballooning. The body is lined in white, but the sleeves are semi sheer, unlined. The floral pattern and color is pretty, the quality isn't fantastic. It's not a bad top per se, but for the price I would recommend looking elsewhere.
Nice fit . Very comfortable and matches great with jeans .
This lived up to my expectation. Great buy, looks nice, wears well!

It hung on me like a sack.  Not my style at all.  This top is meant for tall people only - I'm only 5'3" and I would say if you're under 5'6" don't bother with this top.  I don't think it's that well made either.  I gave it 2 stars for the fabric, the fabric was lovely.

This is a beautiful blouse that’s sheerer than I anticipated.  The body has a thin, cream underlay while the sleeves are completely sheer, and it has a wispy, airy feel to it.  I’m 5’7” and normally wear a size 16/XL, and this fits perfectly in XL.  It’s not tight in any manner and very comfortable.  I like the look with jeans, but it would also work with dress pants or a skirt, along with a sweater for cooler climes, too.  This pretty top complements my boho style very well, and with easy care of machine wash and hang dry, it will be a regular staple in my wardrobe.
When I first opened it, I wasn’t to sure about the color/pattern but it’s actually  cute. It is a lightweight material but it’s lined in the front and back.

This blouse is so pretty!  I love the color/pattern, attractive way the body of the garment lays, and the light,puffy flow of the sleeves.  It has an attractive V-neck that is slightly lower than some, but not too low (no cleavage peaking out on me).  The body is lined; sleeves are not and have light elastic at the wrists.  I washed it by hand/air dried and it came out perfect with no wrinkles.  It is perfect for a "put-together," yet cute look for work.

This blouse is very cute and comfortable to wear.  It has an inner lining so it’s not see thru at all. The material is not stretchy.  Im in between sizes XL and XXL.  I got an XXL and it fits nicely. I like the length, looks good with leggings.
Did not fit properly. Poor quality. Returned it
Very comfortable and stylish.  I received a lot of compliments on it!
This is a comfortable top that fits as expected. The colors are vivid, I love the red. Looks great with blue, white, or black pants or skirt. Can be casual or dressy. I'll wear this a lot.

A very lovely top that can be paired with jeans for a more casual look or dress pants for something a little more business casual. It’ a little bit sheer, so be aware of that when ordering. The manufacturer did take this into consideration and has placed extra fabric around the chest area. This it does make a difference when wearing.  The rust red color of this shirt is absolutely gorgeous! It fits really well and is a very flattering shirt on. Easy to layer under a jacket for a beautiful winter look as well.

This blouse is airy and cute. Nice V shaped neckline. I left it untucked and it covers and belly issues. Sleeves are very puffy and pretty. The puffy sleeve starts just above the elbow. Cute with jeans and sandals, but could be dressy too. I am 5'9" and chose a Large. It lands just at the top of my thighs.

评论概述: Beautiful summery light weight floral blouse
评论详情: I ordered this gorgeous Utyful brand women's long sleeved Boho blouse for myself because I thought it was absolutely gorgeous! I ordered the Fandango pink floral color and it is just as pictured. It's a really lovely light weight summery blouse that's perfect for work or date night. It can dressed up and paired with a skirt or nice slacks. Or it can be dressed down and worn with jeans. It can also be worn untucked or tucked in and belted.  For reference, I'm 5'9 and weigh 190 pounds. I normally wear a women's size 18 or XXL and this blouse fits true to size. If you're in between sizes, I definitely recommend sizing up.  I've washed this blouse by hand in cold water. It's made of 100% polyester and the care instructions recommend hand washing only. I also recommend hanging to dry to avoid shrinkage.  If you're looking for a versatile dressy blouse for yourself or as a gift, this beautiful floral boho style blouse is perfect. Pair with a pair of summery white slacks, and a thin belt, and you have the perfect gift.  Highly Recommended!

评论概述: I'm a size 8/10. I got a Medium
评论详情: I like this top because it's long enough to wear outside and belted, if wanted, or tucked in. The sleeves have an elastic wrist so it makes it possible to push up to wear 3/4 length if wanted, as well.  I was pleasantly surprised to see it was lined with a silk tank style underneath. This should be fine to wear in the summer months since it's very think material and adjustable sleeves. I get cold easy so I can pull the sleeves down when indoors at a restaurant or such. Great plus. Looking forward to dressing it up or keeping it casual.
Super cute light weight top. It definitely has the boho look. It is quite sheer so you might want something more solid underneath 😉

This is a very pretty blouse. I like the subtle colors in the gray blouse and the feminine details like the way the sleeves poof at the bottom. It is exactly as pictured-it has lining in the bodice but the sleeves are sheer. I followed the size chart which put me in a large. I can wear mediums in “standard” brands like Loft or Banana but ordered the large. It fits really well, it skims without being too loose or tight so I would say the size chart is accurate. There is no stretch, it’s chiffon type material so keep that  in mind when choosing.
